reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location - Great, near the square & there is taxis right outside the hotel that will take you anywhere you want for a good price.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel! Great Place To Stay & Recommend To Anyone

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Food - Plenty of options & Really nice different dishes everynight to choose from. For Breakfast there was sausages, eggs, beans, and then omlettes fried eggs or pancakes that they would make in front of you. Also the snacks throughout the day were great, spag bol and pizzas were really nice.
reviews.title: it was okay...pack Imodium

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Drink - The drinks were available from 10 til about midnight. You could get wine straight from the bottle, lager and local spirits & cocktails.
reviews.title: No complaints and would recommend this hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011
reviews.text: Staff - Couldn't ask for nicer staff, they would do anything for you. A bit grumpy at the bar but who wouldn't standing behind there all day and night in suits in the heat! Cleaners cleaned room everyday without fail & they even came to open my case as I had locked it and left the key in England.
reviews.title: You get what you pay for

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is very clean and spacious & I would deffo return for a short break here. A week or 2 mebbies a bit too long. But cannot fault this hotel in anyway for the amount I spent.
reviews.title: Lovely experience and well recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011
reviews.text: I had such a brilliant time the weather was 41 degrees but its was bearable. The hotel staff were great, they tended to your every need. I had a wonderful time, the hotel facilities are great and the rooms are very big. I'm booking again for the same hotel! The hotel also had different entertainment each night and I had a laugh with the staff. This hotel is definitely the one to stay in!
reviews.title: An absolutely amazing experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Well Where can I start on this hotel. Our stuff got nicked from our rooms. The food gave us stomach problems the whole time we was there. I would rate this hotel 1 star. Don't be deceived by the pool, it was dirty and unhygienic. The bathroom suite was a disgrace. There was old tiles broken everywhere the pool area, bathroom, toilets and the lobby.How can anyone sleep in that hot weather with their air conditioning not working. And last but not least their customer service was atrocious, they are such abrupt people and very rude especially the general manager.
reviews.title: We hated it and never ever will go back to this hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The service we received at the reception was friendly and we weren't kept waiting at all
reviews.title: We had a great time such value for money and would recommend it

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: We got most of our information from our porter at the hotel he advised us were to eat and drink as we were all inclusive guests,
reviews.title: Mixed Feelings

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool areas were very populated and there were not enough beds to sunbath on many were taken by towels placed on the beds and hardly used,even from about 7.30am there were many guests placing towels on beds and then going off for breakfast or a day trip on some occasions
reviews.title: it's got potential !!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011
reviews.text: I booked this hotel through Hotels.com for £55 a night double room with breakfast and we were ripped off! I thought we were getting a great deal in a 5* hotel for a not too bad price but turns out this hotel used to be the Royal Mirage and we were put in the part of the hotel that has not yet been renovated. The bathroom was dirty and the balcony looked out onto a car park.
reviews.title: Not five star, not even 4 star!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: While sitting by the pool you can see that the other rooms have been done up. They have nicely new painted balconies and patio sets so I am sure there are probably some nice room in the hotel.
reviews.title: Don't listen to the snobs!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool area was defo not 5*. Pool was a bit dirty and the tiling around the pool was cracked with bits missing. There was not enough sun loungers out for the amount of people staying in the hotel so we witnessed a few arguments around the pool with people having their beds 'stolen' while they'd been having a bite to eat.
reviews.title: Fantastic Holiday !!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Food and drinks are over priced considering some other places, £2 for a can of juice and £3 for a half pint can of beer. Food menu - boring!
reviews.title: not as good as first ipressions led us to beleive

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: We asked if there was any entertainment on in the hotel, its so huge you;d think it would have something. Nope - just a TV lounge.
reviews.title: Mixed feelings as loved marrakesh but as not many spoke English it was a bit daunting

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: stayed first 3 days of our trip at Mansour al Dhabi hotel had approx 12 guests so me and my friend left that after 3 nights and booked in at Royal Mirage now pickalbatros.. What can i say we stayed here for 6 nights and they were the best 6 nights spent in Marrakech...
reviews.title: We couldnt ask for more

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room was twin room with queen size beds very spacious and clean with separate loo and bathroom ... sit down balcony with sliding doors with pool view .... air conditioning worked fine.
reviews.title: Fantastic value for money break.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: The pool:
reviews.title: Great for the price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: this was the highlight for us good music very helpful staff and great entertainment made loads of friends at the pool side , we was lucky that during our stay there was a big football match between morocco and algeria and both Moroccan and Algerian football fans kept the pool side party going with good dances toeards each other and all well behaved.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel, very pleasantly surprised. Quality accommodation in a good location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Lobbies:
reviews.title: Absolutely loved it!!!
